# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| main    | :white_check_mark: |
| 2.8.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| 2.7.x   | :x:                |
| 2.6.x   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Email primary maintainer about vulnerability and version.
Expected reply and triage within 1 week depending on other conditions.
